title: SKS Power resolution faces roadblock as HC orders CBI probe
description: Torrent Power and Sharda Energy and Power are the two entities in the fray to acquire the 600 MW power generation company. The committee of creditors last year approved a â‚¹1,800-crore debt resolution plan for Sharda Energy. However, Torrent Power claimed it gave a higher offer and alleged an improper sale process.
